OWASP_Top_10_2021.description: Moving up from the fifth position, 94% of applications were tested for some form of broken access control.
Previously known as Sensitive Data Exposure, failures related to cryptography often lead to sensitive data exposure or system compromise.
prevention: Encrypt all sensitive data at rest

OWASP_Top_10_2021.description: Injection flaws, such as SQL injection, NoSQL injection, and LDAP injection, occur when untrusted data is sent to an interpreter.

data_protection: Encrypt sensitive data in transit and at rest
